feed.title: UpSnap Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.4.0
entry.content:
[!CAUTION]

Update to version 4.3.4 first before upgrading to version 4.4.0!

You might risk database migrations to fail if you update from a prior version.

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 69bb334b20ef1f5601cbea74f09a9915910b53c9: fix: make more buttons reactive, remove user create rule, close #800 (@seriousm4x)
  • 885b69ff038670daa3e842f351037c4dbefe1bfb: fix: upper case (@seriousm4x)
  • 27e6bf01d39a2331924bec697aff0ba36c80b9e8: fix: apply migrations (@seriousm4x)
  • ecce74795d6ce626df3e1799b99c5187a173d452: fix: more fixes for pocketbase > 0.23 (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

  • d3e88bc2dd05d6cf54885fbdd1dd108e776e4baf: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/dbx from 1.10.1 to 1.11.0 in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 62c3de819aedcefe7e9214ab91758a25ee87d39e: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.4.1
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 9ebe092b9d93d77d229e1da9a642f305f7ebaff3: fix: create custom superuser setup to change new pocketbase superuser behavior (@seriousm4x)
  • 6d06e5ae9bff9b014436327332e4fb2d4002d5fd: fix: migration error on new database, close #922 (@seriousm4x)
  • 47b81553befa785b73ddc8aff2c6774975791ff2: fix: use named parameters (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.4.2
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 48ad232b50f7ea7b1d7450d75c3906a8e4f3d1c5: fix: changelog ignore_tags and int/string warning (@seriousm4x)
  • e0431509e2d2ca871e64d7255bf0beb15a3c750e: fix: fallback warning (@seriousm4x)
  • 322c1ccc509233384561335854ea8f4d6976d1b1: fix: go test (@seriousm4x)
  • c6a9af40867a21794d1b9aa476cf03a788a45dc2: fix: importSettings argument (@seriousm4x)
  • e124f5b86e19dc7dab59ba45e24c1f330801171e: fix: minimize destination slice to just use the broadcast string (@seriousm4x)
  • 61980c62d7d1f05995ae794e7090141325be8ccd: fix: remove global app variable (@seriousm4x)
  • 4540d8b8517a2db69a1865f321bd101f3b102db5: fix: send 4 magic packets to different address combinations #583 (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

  • 0d6d94b4557d534408db7a95f1bc76188fcc940e: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 46016ff5fa45a08dd5e5bdc6d2017857541558db: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • e98b9ba75da6e74c87684dbb95f180510121ee34: go-dep: bump golang.org/x/sys from 0.28.0 to 0.29.0 in /backend (@dependabot[bot])

Npm dependencies

  • 1c07638b9f60c352a36166d71dd9598c6ef3d41a: npm-dep: bump @sveltejs/kit from 2.15.1 to 2.15.2 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • bc3cd9b77ff72ab103b59319fa5e9a6010d9736a: npm-dep: bump pocketbase from 0.24.0 to 0.25.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • abe7b446be51041e2fa76a454db71f644404169f: npm-dep: bump typescript-eslint from 8.18.2 to 8.19.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 19acedeea062c5e5c4aad23c5ad6e7d542e1e137: npm-dep: bump typescript-eslint from 8.19.0 to 8.19.1 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 8372d522126c2a6620fb3fa47d965ce1f3c5ecac: npm-dep: update (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.5.0
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 641095b1bd52b40f3af45470872ac4181d7c29c2: feat: add freebsd support (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 14a98412180f544d9e31f20488b5a0f519788f05: Merge pull request #940 from hrhrkeee/add-Japanese-Language (@seriousm4x)
  • 1f0818b5ed584c7560d3b55aae6b7df76c820651: Update README.md (@hrhrkeee)
  • 743da5c4f373ad36b40c683d0486431ef07ff61b: add JapaneseLanguage（日本語） (@hrhrkeee)
  • 74326f3436441f81411c5af933c6e11fb37bf5b4: prettier formatting (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

  • 7c91f026061010cf43f4c3693010ebcdd4b2eed2: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • d1a0457702fef04e63704ce0c0bc332ecfa19adc: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 8da9b15b5ec5f3805ee878e6a76e39dc04c87f29: go-dep: update (@seriousm4x)

Npm dependencies

  • 7e3094301590320ab893b30652b8ed33fa82b601: npm-dep: bump @eslint/compat from 1.2.4 to 1.2.5 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • c9bb412729218666503e24675c7e88223947591a: npm-dep: bump @eslint/js from 9.17.0 to 9.18.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 1216702203ad6f8e82344526c151c79b0ba6a27d: npm-dep: bump eslint from 9.17.0 to 9.18.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 84f7a792cfd44da1cfa4d51897e70d9e9a6632e2: npm-dep: bump svelte-check from 4.1.3 to 4.1.4 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • db8eaab3db3b05a429f6d4430871a96c6c908c2b: npm-dep: update (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.5.1
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 2d8fce32d39fd9bb0854b91bcb5b792c68f5cfdc: feat: allow non http/https links for ports and devices (@seriousm4x)

Bug fixes

  • 62cb0e8f73fc6d8df43c9b6ff21816e3ef72af6e: fix: js eslint warning (@seriousm4x)

Others
